static const char* GetIdentifier() \
{ \
static const char* ident = #BASENAME ":" #THISNAME; \
return ident; \
} \
virtual Gwen::Controls::Base* DynamicCast(const char* Variable) \
{ \
if (GetIdentifier() == Variable) \
return this; \
\
return BaseClass::DynamicCast(Variable); \
